title: Song of the Heavenly Soldiers

tokens.lyric: Beautiful morning sunrise, calm above the
land of our
hope;

lines.raw: [A]Beautiful morning sunrise, calm above the [E7]land of our [A]hope;

tokens.lyric: Robed in white chosen people,
fighting for the
land of God.

lines.raw: [D]Robed in white chosen people, [E7]fighting for the [A]land of God.

tokens.lyric: Towering high the snow white
mountain stands aloft in
majesty.

lines.raw: [A7]Towering high the snow white [D]mountain stands aloft in [Bm]majesty.

tokens.lyric: Ruling with power over the world,
shining o'er the
universe.

lines.raw: [E7]Ruling with power over the world, [A]shining o'er the [F#m]universe.

tokens.lyric: Marching on Heavenly Soldiers, marching on with His
love,

lines.raw: [A]Marching on Heavenly Soldiers, marching on with His [D]love,

tokens.lyric: Uniting in life eternal
with our God in
Heaven and
earth.

lines.raw: [A]Uniting in life eternal [F#m]with our God in [Bm7]Heaven and [E7]earth.

tokens.lyric: Heavenly soldiers fighting strongly for the victory;

lines.raw: [A]Heavenly soldiers fighting strongly for the victory;

tokens.lyric: Bringing lost souls to harvest from the fallen world of fear, Freely

lines.raw: [A]Bringing lost souls to harvest from the fallen world of fear, Freely

tokens.lyric: giving love and beauty to them from our Parents' heart.

lines.raw: [A]giving love and beauty to them from our Parents' heart.

tokens.lyric: Spreading the word over the world, rescuing the family of God.

lines.raw: [A]Spreading the word over the world, rescuing the family of God.

tokens.lyric: Marching on Heavenly soldiers, marching on with His love,

lines.raw: [A]Marching on Heavenly soldiers, marching on with His love,

tokens.lyric: Uniting in life eternal with our God in Heaven and earth.

lines.raw: [A]Uniting in life eternal with our God in Heaven and earth.

tokens.lyric: Sanctified, brave crusaders, join in our True Parents' fight;

lines.raw: [A]Sanctified, brave crusaders, join in our True Parents' fight;

tokens.lyric: Lifting high the rod of iron, smashing evils of the world!

lines.raw: [A]Lifting high the rod of iron, smashing evils of the world!

tokens.lyric: Now restoring Eden's glory, on the earth eternally,

lines.raw: [A]Now restoring Eden's glory, on the earth eternally,

tokens.lyric: Praising our God, Heavenly Father, giving joy to comfort His heart

lines.raw: [A]Praising our God, Heavenly Father, giving joy to comfort His heart

tokens.lyric: Marching on Heavenly soldiers, marching on with His love.

lines.raw: [A]Marching on Heavenly soldiers, marching on with His love.

tokens.lyric: Uniting in life eternal with our God in Heaven and earth.

lines.raw: [A]Uniting in life eternal with our God in Heaven and earth.
